com.anvil.balloongame

Class GameDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.Game
      • com.anvil.balloongame.GameDriver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener

    public class GameDriver
extends com.badlogic.gdx.Game
    Controls the program execution, starting with the splash screen, then transitioning to the main menu.

    Instance Variables

    1. batch - SpriteBatch - The OpenGL texture batch that the game uses.
    Author:
    Edward Wang

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public void create()
        Called at the creation of this object. Instantiates the texture batch to be used for rendering, and immediately starts the main menu. The custom cursor for the game is instantiated.

        Local Variables

        1. c - Pixmap - Pixel map representing the custom cursor.

      • splashScreen

        public void splashScreen()
        Plays the Splash Screen animation.

      • mainMenu

        public void mainMenu()
        Switches to the main menu, and handle any extraneous conditions.

      • gameStart

        public void gameStart()
        Switches to the game, and handle any extraneous conditions.

        THIS CURRENTLY DOES NOT DO ANYTHING, AS THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE GAMESCREEN IS NOT YET COMPLETED.

      • render

        public void render()
        Called at every frame of the program rendering loop. Renders the game window.
        Specified by:
        render in interface com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener
        Overrides:
        render in class com.badlogic.gdx.Game
